thread.title: Army Sgt. Who Danced with Melania at Ball Says It Was “A Great Privilege”
thread.title_full: Army Sgt. Who Danced with Melania at Ball Says It Was “A Great Privilege”

author: Harris
title: Army Sgt. Who Danced with Melania at Ball Says It Was “A Great Privilege”
text:
Tucker Destroys BuzzFeed Editor Who Likens Himself to Matt Drudge 
“It’s incredible. Obviously it was a great privilege and honor to get the chance to dance with the first lady,’ Medina told Inside Edition . “She was just saying hi to me, congratulating me on being selected, and I just told her that she was beautiful and that she had a beautiful family, and she smiled at that.” 
Medina spoke of the first lady’ s graciousness: “She was just trying to get to know me. Behind the scenes, she wanted to talk to me more.” 
He even asked if he could spin her, to which she reportedly replied, “Of course.” Advertisement - story continues below 
“So I did it and then the crowd went crazy,” Medina said . “She was nervous. I don’t think she was ready for all of that attention.” 
Whether she was ready for the attention or not, it was clear to everyone watching that Melania Trump handled all of the attention with dignity, class and grace. 
This soldier had it right: What a great privilege to share that moment with our first lady. 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter and be sure to add your thoughts to the comment section below. Advertisement - story continues below
